biotools.summary: This web server is to perform Binding Analysis for Regulation of Transcription (BART) is a bioinformatics tool for predicting functional factors (including transcription factors and chromatin regulators) that bind at cis-regulatory regions to regulate gene expression in human or mouse, taking a query gene list or a ChIP-seq dataset as input.

bioschemas.name: BARTweb
